name: Dimitirou Athanasiadis
story: Panos Manago is a seasoned soldier who has spent his entire career in the military. He is a skilled rifleman and has been trained in anti-tank warfare. Throughout his years of service, Panos has seen combat in multiple deployments and has received several commendations for his bravery and dedication to his comrades. Despite the horrors of war, Panos remains steadfast in his duty to protect his country and his fellow soldiers.
